TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapSchemaImporter extends System.Xml.Serialization.SchemaImporter

summary.span: 在 .NET Framework 中使用，以便針對 WSDL 文件中的 SOAP 編碼訊息部分產生 .NET Framework 型別的內部對應。

span.span: Used within the .NET Framework to generate internal mappings to .NET Framework types for SOAP-encoded message parts in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會由[Web 服務描述語言工具 (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)，而類別，同時從 Web 服務描述語言 （產生用戶端 proxy 類別或抽象伺服器類別WSDL) 文件。The class is used by the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88), and the class, while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 而不是直接使用這個類別，使用 Wsdl.exe。Instead of using this class directly, use Wsdl.exe. 類別具有要產生內部組件中定義之元素的 WSDL 文件的.NET Framework 類型對應的方法。The class has methods to generate internal mappings to .NET Framework types for part elements defined in a WSDL document. 類別是只適用於 WSDL 文件會指定 SOAP 編碼的 SOAP 1.1 規格第 5 節中所述。The class is used only when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public SoapSchemaImporter (System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas schemas);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas schemas) cil managed
Public Sub New (schemas As XmlSchemas)
public: SoapSchemaImporter(System::Xml::Serialization::XmlSchemas ^ schemas);
new System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaImporter : System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas -> System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaImporter

param.name: schemas
param.span: 物件的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並指定 物件，表示 WSDL 文件中定義之 SOAP 編碼訊息所使用的 XML 結構描述。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying objects representing the XML schemas used by SOAP encoded messages defined in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 編碼方式，如 SOAP 1.1 規格中，第 5 節中所定義中指定的 WSDL 文件。SOAP encoding, as defined in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification, is specified in a WSDL document. 而不是建立的執行個體直接類別中，使用 Wsdl.exe。Instead of creating an instance of the class directly, use Wsdl.exe.

MemberSignature.Value: public SoapSchemaImporter (System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas schemas, System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers typeIdentifiers);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas schemas, class System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers typeIdentifiers) cil managed
Public Sub New (schemas As XmlSchemas, typeIdentifiers As CodeIdentifiers)
public: SoapSchemaImporter(System::Xml::Serialization::XmlSchemas ^ schemas, System::Xml::Serialization::CodeIdentifiers ^ typeIdentifiers);
new System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaImporter : System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemas * System.Xml.Serialization.CodeIdentifiers -> System.Xml.Serialization.SoapSchemaImporter

param.name: schemas
param.span: 物件的集合。

span.span: A collection of objects.

param.name: typeIdentifiers
param.span: 物件，其指定針對 WSDL 文件中定義的繫結所產生的類別集合。

span.span: A object that specifies a collection of classes being generated for bindings defined in a WSDL document.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並指定 物件，表示由 SOAP 編碼訊息所使用的 XML 結構描述，再加上針對 WSDL 文件中定義的繫結所產生的類別。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying objects representing the XML schemas used by SOAP encoded messages, plus classes being generated for bindings defined in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SOAP 編碼方式，如 SOAP 1.1 規格中，第 5 節中所定義中指定的 WSDL 文件。SOAP encoding, as defined in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification, is specified in a WSDL document. 而不是建立的執行個體直接類別中，使用 Wsdl.exe。Instead of creating an instance of the class directly, use Wsdl.exe.

span.span: to indicate that the type being generated may indirectly inherit from the base type; otherwise, .

summary.span: 針對 WSDL 文件 (指定基底型別 (Base Type) 的位置) 中定義之 SOAP 編碼項目部分的型別，產生內部型別對應資訊。

span.span: Generates internal type mapping information for the type of a SOAP-encoded element part defined in a WSDL document where a base type is specified.

returns.span: 對應至 WSDL 訊息部分之衍生型別 (Derived Type) 的 .NET Framework 型別對應資訊。

span.span: The .NET Framework type mapping information for a derived type corresponding to a WSDL message part.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法類別會由[Web 服務描述語言工具 (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88)時從 Web 服務描述語言 （產生用戶端 proxy 類別或抽象伺服器類別WSDL) 文件。The method of the class is used by the [Web Services Description Language Tool (Wsdl.exe)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/b9210348-8bc2-4367-8c91-d1a04b403e88) while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 而不是直接呼叫這個方法，使用 Wsdl.exe。Instead of calling this method directly, use Wsdl.exe. 類別只適用於 WSDL 文件會指定 SOAP 編碼的 SOAP 1.1 規格第 5 節中所述。The class is used only when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.

summary.span: 針對 WSDL 文件中定義的單一 SOAP 編碼項目部分，產生內部型別對應資訊。

span.span: Generates internal type mapping information for a single SOAP-encoded element part defined in a WSDL document.

summary.span: 針對 WSDL 文件中定義的單一 SOAP 編碼項目部分，產生內部型別對應資訊。

span.span: Generates internal type mapping information for a single SOAP-encoded element part defined in a WSDL document.

returns.span: WSDL 訊息定義之單一項目部分的 .NET Framework 型別對應。

span.span: The .NET Framework type mapping for a single element part of a WSDL message definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法類別使用 Wsdl.exe 工具所產生用戶端 proxy 類別或抽象伺服器類別，從 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件時。The method of the class is used by the Wsdl.exe tool while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 而不是直接呼叫這個方法，使用 Wsdl.exe。Instead of calling this method directly, use Wsdl.exe. 類別只適用於 WSDL 文件會指定 SOAP 編碼的 SOAP 1.1 規格第 5 節中所述。The class is used only when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification. 此簽章的WSDL 訊息會包裝元素內的單一組件時，會使用方法。This signature of the method is used when a WSDL message is wrapped within a single part element.

summary.span: 針對在 WSDL 文件中定義之 SOAP 編碼訊息的項目部分，產生內部型別對應資訊。

span.span: Generates internal type mapping information for the element parts of a SOAP-encoded message defined in a WSDL document.

returns.span: WSDL 訊息定義中項目部分的 .NET Framework 型別對應。

span.span: The .NET Framework type mappings for the element parts of a WSDL message definition.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法類別使用 Wsdl.exe 工具所產生用戶端 proxy 類別或抽象伺服器類別，從 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 文件時。The method of the class is used by the Wsdl.exe tool while generating client proxy classes or abstract server classes from a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document. 而不是直接呼叫這個方法，使用 Wsdl.exe。Instead of calling this method directly, use Wsdl.exe. 類別只適用於 WSDL 文件會指定 SOAP 編碼的 SOAP 1.1 規格第 5 節中所述。The class is used only when a WSDL document specifies SOAP encoding, as described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification. 參數值至方法摘錄自 WSDL 文件，包括訊息項目包含的部分項目中的訊息定義。The parameter values to the method are taken from a message definition in a WSDL document, including the part elements the message element contains.
